mapper.insert: insert into session(token, expire_at, owner_id) values (#{model.token}, #{model.expireAt}, #{model.owner.id})
mapper.select: select s.id as id, s.token as token, s.expire_at as expireAt, s.owner_id as `owner.id`, u.username as `owner.username`, u.name as `owner.name`, u.balance as `owner.balance`, u.credit as `owner.credit` from session s left join user u on s.owner_id = u.id where s.token = #{token}
